Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. Given its significance, I believe it's only fair that we discuss a price that reflects its true worth. Considering its quality and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose a price of $15000 for the product. I trust this offer will resonate with your expectations and aligns with the value you see in this item. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss this proposal, please feel free to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
